DOC.brief_summary: One nation 's major health priority , outline Healthy People 2010 , increase proportion child age 19 35 month receive universally recommended vaccine . This study compare two intervention increase immunization rate age group , one use well-studied primary care practice-based method use innovative technology increase immunization rate population-level . Results study provide data relevant nationally guide future investment resource increase up-to-date rate young child prior school entry . Hypothesis : Population-based approach effective practice-based intervention increase immunization among 19-35 month old .
DOC.brief_title: Population Versus Practice-based Interventions Increase Immunizations
